FuncDef:
The active ipsec command enables Internet Protocol Security (IPsec) on a specified IPsec service board.
The undo active ipsec command disables IPSec on a specified IPsec service board.
By default, IPsec is disabled on a specified IPsec service board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ID of the slot in which an IPsec service board resides.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The VSU not loaded with a GTL license does not support IPsec services.
To configure IPsec services on a VSU, purchase a valid GTL license and load the license to the VSU.
Prerequisites
A GTL license has been loaded to the CF card on the main control boards and has been activated using the license active command.
Precautions
After the GTL license becomes invalid, purchase a valid GTL license in time because the GTL license expiration affects the IPsec function on a VSU.
